text:
Sounds good. Happy to give any feedback on stuff :blush: 
Also if you need help on Cv’s, cover letter, etc for applying to creative, games, or vfx companies, I’d be happy to give tips. 
My graduated students have been busy this summer in vfx jobs. Really proud of them :blush: 
It’s busy I’m the London market nowadays so that’s a good sign. And quite a few vfx companies are also doing VR/games. Pretty neat stuff.
